description: I started my professional career as an intern, learning software development best practices, reading books, learning TDD methodology and agile principles. I contributed to internal projects while developing fundamental skills in modern web development.

I developed and maintained ETL data processing pipelines for data analysis. I worked with large-scale data systems, implemented automated testing strategies, and contributed to platform scalability improvements.
I collaborated on software projects focused on mathematical research. I contributed to a cutting-edge technology initiative, focusing on clean architecture and maintainable code practices.

I participated in the development of a greenfield project for invoice management between hotels and travel agencies. I implemented improvements in different processes for various internal-use projects and, above all, helped with the renewal of a large legacy codebase.

Leading internal initiatives, mentoring team members, and contributing to company growth strategies. Strongly focused on the use of AI tools and on sharing knowledge, improving processes, and fostering a collaborative engineering culture.
